best.title: Gladiator
best.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

worst.title: Battlefield Earth
worst.plot: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

best.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
best.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

worst.title: Glitter
worst.plot: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.

best.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
best.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

worst.title: Rollerball
worst.plot: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

best.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
best.plot: The final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of the future of Middle-earth.

worst.title: House of the Dead
worst.plot: A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.

best.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
best.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

worst.title: Catwoman
worst.plot: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

best.title: Batman Begins
best.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

worst.title: Son of the Mask
worst.plot: Tim Avery finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son 'born of the mask', he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

best.title: The Departed
best.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

worst.title: Date Movie
worst.plot: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

best.title: There Will Be Blood
best.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

worst.title: Epic Movie
worst.plot: A spoof on previous years' epic movies, 4 orphans are on an epic adventure

best.title: The Dark Knight
best.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests of his ability to fight injustice.

worst.title: Disaster Movie
worst.plot: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

best.title: Inglourious Basterds
best.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

worst.title: S. Darko
worst.plot: Donnie Darko's little sister Samantha and her best friend Corey are on a cross-country road trip, but soon find themselves entangled in a dangerous glitch in the time-space continuum.

best.title: Inception
best.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

worst.title: Vampires Suck
worst.plot: A spoof of vampire-themed movies. Becca finds herself torn between 2 boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom

best.title: Warrior
best.plot: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament

worst.title: Jack and Jill
worst.plot: Family guy Jack Sadelstein prepares for the annual event he dreads: the Thanksgiving visit of his fraternal twin sister, the needy and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.

best.title: Django Unchained
best.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

worst.title: Piranha 3DD
worst.plot: After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

best.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
best.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

worst.title: Scary Movie 5
worst.plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

best.title: Interstellar
best.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

worst.title: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas
worst.plot: His annual Christmas party faltering thanks to his cynical brother-in-law, Kirk Cameron attempts to save the day by showing him that Jesus Christ remains a crucial component of the holiday.

best.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
best.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

worst.title: The Human Centipede III
worst.plot: Taking inspiration from The Human Centipede films, the warden of a notorious and troubled prison looks to create a 500-person human centipede as a solution to his problems.

best.title: Hacksaw Ridge
best.plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

worst.title: Fifty Shades of Black
worst.plot: An inexperienced college student meets a wealthy businessman whose sexual practices put a strain on their relationship.

best.title: Coco
best.plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

worst.title: The Emoji Movie
worst.plot: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

best.title: Avengers: Infinity War
best.plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

worst.title: Slender Man
worst.plot: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one goes missing.

best.title: Parasite
best.plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

worst.title: Cats
worst.plot: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.

best.title: Soul
best.plot: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

worst.title: Hard Kill
worst.plot: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.
